Quickstride knew his friend needed someone with him who could offer moral s=
upport.  He takes a seat with Windlord and looks to him in a friendly manne=
r.

" I know something that might help get your mind off things for a while=
.  Things have settled down for a little while so I think it's okay if we v=
enture out for a bit .  There's a place I found one day while grazing outsi=
de, and I never saw anything as extraordinary as what I saw when I walked i=
n.  "

He gets back into beast mode and offers his back to Windlord.

" mou=
nt up, I'll take you there right now.  Trust me, it's so worth the ride out=
 there.  And I'm not gonna spoil the surprise."

In the room, Tucson gives =
Talon a gentile smile and a loving arm around her shoulder.  Gone is the si=
gn of bad temperament as he focuses his attention on her.  A tiny air of fr=
iskiness comes over him as he gently pulls Talon into his embrace.

" You'r=
e absolutely right, Talon.  It's a shame the CR chambers aren't designed to=
 fit two individuals together.  Which reminds me..  I still owe you somethi=
ng don't I?"

His mind was clearly on something else now as a playful look =
comes over his faceplate.  If anyone could bring him out of a bad mood, it =
was Talon.  Now somewhat cured of his temper he now remembers something els=
e of great importance.  He still had to meet with Wheelie.  But now that he=
 was in a better mood, he could converse with him in a more sane manner.

"=
 Ah, I forgot, I have to meet with Wheelie first.  I asked Uproar to escort=
 him to my quarters but, I'm sure Wheelie had other ideas.  I better go res=
cue Uproar from extreme exhaustion, no doubt Wheelie is wearing him out som=
ewhere in the base."

He gives Talon a kiss on her cheek and a last minute =
hug.

" I won't take long I promise.  Then it's to the CR chamber."

He the=
n turns to head towards his quarters.  From a far he can hear Uproar chokin=
g on a rather large hairball and he's quick to follow the sound.

" Uproar,=
 are you alright?"

Uproar gags but manages to say something.

" Hairball. =
 Need help getting it out."

Tucson cocks his head.

" hmm?  What exactly i=
s a hairball?"

Uproar looks to him in desperation.

"please just help me o=
kay?!"

Tucson nods.

"What do you  need?"

Uproar looks up.

" Whack me on=
 the back real hard. That usually gets the hairballs out"

Tucson hesitates=
 for a moment and then with a firm but careful slap on Uproar's back, the h=
airball gets expelled.  A look of relief floods the cat's face.

"ah, much =
better. Thanks Sir, I needed that."

Tucson smiles and tries to listen for =
wheelie.

" I take it Wheelie took off on you.  Don't worry, my fault for n=
ot warning you about him.  All right, I'll go find him."

He leaves Uproar =
who now heaves a large sigh of relief.



Perpetually on the move and const=
antly busy.

> Quickstride gives Windlord a soft pat on the back in sympathy.  He=
 realizes the stress that Hydras had put on everyone, including those most =
effected by the shell program.
>  
> "what hydras did to you and the others=
 was unspeakable.  But look, there is a bright side, if it weren't for Tucs=
on none of us would have ever seen any of you again.  And for the first tim=
e in a long time, we're finally giving Hydras what he deserves.  So yeah wh=
at Hydras did was really bad but, Tucson isn't abou to let him get away wit=
h it.  And to think he wants another one on one with Hydras.  I saw a huge =
dent on his shoulder, looked like something that hasn't quite healed yet.. =
 I don't think he's taking the proper time in the CR chamber."
>  
> Inside=
 the room, Tucson begins to show signs of fatigue and puts his hand over hi=
s forehead.  He knew he wasn't taking the proper time to repair and recharg=
e properly, due to the fact that he was assisting others before helping him=
self. 
>  
> He turns his head to Leo Prime.
>  
> " Nemesis...  Leo Prime,=
 the ship, it could be Decepticon property.,,   I vote we remain cautious a=
t all times."
>

>>> Quickstride looks to both Windlor=
d and Rodimus and then heaves a sigh. He knew of one individual who could h=
ave possibly helped everyone in this situation.  One that could teach every=
one how to clear their minds.  The same mech who also trained Prowl, Tucson=
, Straight Shot and Nightshift. 
>>>  
>>> "Master Yokitron would definitel=
y have been a big help ta all of us.  He often trained distressed warriors =
as yourselves how ta clear one's mind to purge it of impure thoughts that m=
ay overcome them.  He did that through meditation.  Surrounding one's soul =
with a peaceful environment where one could find inner peace.  That's what =
everyone needs, inner peace."
>>>

Lord Elder, who he just happens to      notice.

, please join us.  I was just telling these guys about Master Yokitron and =
how he used ta help troubled mechs through meditation.  I think we could al=
l use a little bit of that, huh?"
